app_metadata.description: AI-powered app for browsing, organizing & sharing your photo collection.
app_metadata.name: photoprism

run_as_context.description: Photoprism runs as a root user.

app_metadata.title: Photoprism

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Photoprism

attrs.label: Site URL
attrs.description:
The URL for the Photoprism site.</br>
Examples:
  - https://photoprism.example.com/photoprism
  - https://photoprism.example.com
  - http://photoprism.example.com

attrs.label: Public
attrs.description:
Enable public access to Photoprism.</br>
If enabled, Photoprism will be accessible without authentication.

attrs.label: Admin Password
attrs.description:
Set a password for Photoprism.</br>
If public access is enabled, a password is required.

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that Actual Budget files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that Actual Budget files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.

attrs.label: Certificate ID
attrs.description: The certificate ID to use for Photoprism.

attrs.label: DNS Options
attrs.description:
DNS options for the container.</br>
Format: key:value</br>
Example: attempts:3

attrs.label: Photoprism Import Storage
attrs.description: The path to store Photoprism Import.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

1.3.8.readme:
PhotoPrism

PhotoPrism is a server-based application for browsing, organizing and sharing your personal photo collection.
